title: Courtyard Boston Andover Entices Sports Teams Playing At Merrimack College With Special Deal
text:
Courtyard Boston Andover
Hotel in Andover offers teams discounted rates, complimentary bus parking and 5,000 Marriott Rewards points when 10 or more rooms are booked
ANDOVER, Mass. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Sports teams heading to Merrimack College for an upcoming game or tournament this fall can win it all at Courtyard Boston Andover .
Less than 6 miles from the university, the Andover hotel gives players and coaches plenty of comfort and convenience worth cheering about. When teams book 10 or more rooms, they'll enjoy discounted rates along with complimentary bus parking and 5,000 bonus Marriott Rewards points. And that's just the beginning.
As one of the premier hotels in Andover, MA , Courtyard invites guests to score big right on site. Teams heading to an intense practice or big game can fuel up at The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect. . Serving a variety of morning favorites, from thick-cut French toast to healthy oatmeal, as well as specialty Starbucks beverages, The Bistro will be guests' one-stop shop before heading out for the day's adventures. Following a win, players and fans can head back and celebrate over mouthwatering meals and evening cocktails in a friendly and casual setting. For a simple beverage or late-night snack, guests can make a trip to The Market, open 24/7 and conveniently located right in the lobby.
When not practicing, playing or indulging, athletes can enjoy a peaceful dip in the hotel's indoor pool or relax sore muscles in the whirlpool. A fitness center is also available for use 24 hours a day, allowing athletes to stay active and entertained with a variety of free weights, medicine balls and cardiovascular equipment featuring personal TV screens.
Players and their entourages can retreat to stylishly appointed guest rooms designed with today's traveler in mind. Featuring plenty of room to spread out, the accommodations are perfect for sharing while still giving teammates plenty of their own space. Guests wishing to relax can stretch out on luxurious bedding and catch up on their favorite shows on the flat-panel TVs, while those needing to study can stay productive at well-lit work desks featuring ergonomic chairs and convenient outlets. Complimentary Wi-Fi is available in every room, allowing travelers to keep up with friends and family near and far.
Whether in town for football, field hockey, volleyball or ice hockey, players will come out ahead at the Andover, MA hotel.
About Courtyard Boston Andover
Courtyard Boston Andover at 10 Campanelli Drive in Andover, MA , is in the beautiful Merrimack Valley area, just minutes from Salem, NH and an hour to Kittery, ME . The hotel features 3 floors, 134 rooms, 12 suites and 2 meeting rooms boasting 1,274 square feet of flexible event space. The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect. complimentary Wi-Fi, an indoor pool, fitness center and outdoor terrace are among the many amenities available. For information, visit CourtyardAndoverSports.com or call 1-978-794-0700.
